thread.title: Post-Brexit vision being set out for Midlands Engine - Leicester Mercury

author: Tom Pegden
title: Post-Brexit vision being set out for Midlands Engine - Leicester Mercury

organizations.name: leicester mercury grow international trade and investment increase innovation

text:
Grow International Trade and Investment Increase Innovation and Enterprise Shape Great Places 
Sir John said: “The launch of the Midlands Engine Vision for Growth marks a key moment for the Midlands. 
“By improving our productivity and driving economic growth we can power the country’s post-Brexit economy, not just for the benefit of Midlands but for the whole UK.” 
He said the group has spoken to business leaders, innovators, local authorities and local enterprise partnerships to understand their needs and priorities and will continue this engagement throughout the autumn, with a roadshow targeted at our small and medium sized businesses. 
To find out more about the Midlands Engine Vision for Growth, the Leicester and Leicestershire Enterprise Partnership (LLEP) is hosting an event on Monday October 23 as par of the Leicester Business Festival. 
The Annual Meeting and Midlands Engine Vision for Growth event will highlight activity that the LLEP has undertaken over the past year and look at future priorities.
